mapper.insert: insert into attachment_audit (attachment_id, company_id, project_id, status, opinion, cst_create, cst_modified) values (#{attachmentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{projectId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opinion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cstCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{cstModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into attachment_audit (attachment_id, company_id, project_id, status, opinion, cst_create, cst_modified) values (#{attachmentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{projectId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opinion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), now()) on duplicate key update status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, opinion = #{opinion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cst_modified = now()
mapper.update: update attachment_audit set company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, opinion = #{opinion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cst_create = #{cstCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, cst_modified = #{cstModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where attachment_id = #{attachmentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select attachment_id, company_id, project_id, status, opinion, cst_create, cst_modified from attachment_audit
